name: Parsnips
properties: Low calorie density when not fried
benefits: Parsnips are a nutritious root vegetable that adds natural sweetness and fiber to soups and stews. Unlike white potatoes, they maintain their nutritional integrity when used in soups without adding excessive glycemic load.
amount: 1 parsnip chopped per serving in soups

quotes: Add the celery, parsnip, carrot and beetroot.
